definition: Enclosed or semi-enclosed spaces within or attached to buildings that serve specific functional purposes.

positive_examples: The family gathered on the covered porch for dinner.
She stored her car in the garage during winter.
The hotel balcony overlooked the ocean.
Children played in the sunny courtyard.
We converted the dusty attic into storage space.
The lanai was perfect for morning coffee.
negative_examples: The bridge connected the two buildings.
Water flowed through the concrete pipe.
The monument stood in the town square.
Cars traveled on the highway overpass.
The fence marked the property boundary.
The well provided water for the village.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Infrastructure, Monuments, Barriers, Pathways, Utilities
